thread.title: Fingerpaint Marketing Names Kevin Kish as Head of Finance and Accounting

author: cnbc.com
title: Fingerpaint Marketing Names Kevin Kish as Head of Finance and Accounting
text:
SARATOGA SPRINGS, N.Y., Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Fingerpaint Marketing , an independent, full-service nationwide marketing agency, announces finance industry veteran, Kevin Kish, as Head of Finance & Accounting.
In his new role, Kish will be tasked with managing profit and investments, integration across offices, business growth and acquisitions. Kish brings nearly two decades of industry experience to the title-free marketing agency.
"We searched extensively for the right person to lead our finance and accounting department, especially given our incredible year over year growth," said Ed Mitzen, Founder of Fingerpaint Marketing. "Kevin is bright, energetic and his dedicated attitude will serve him well in directing our growing team and increasing roster of clients."
Kish joins Fingerpaint from Syneos Health (formerly known as inVentiv Communications), where he served as Senior Vice President of Finance, conducting day-to-day management of multiple P&L's with $75M in revenues, including forecasting, pricing, hiring and investment decisions. Kish was with Syneos since 2003, where he started as a Senior Financial Analyst and climbed his way up the corporate ladder holding a variety of financial and operational positions both in Central Finance, as well as within the advertising agencies. Prior to Syneos, Kish spent five years at Victoria's Secret Stores in finance and real estate.
"I've long admired Fingerpaint's entrepreneurial spirit and unique culture," said Kevin Kish, Head of Finance & Accounting of Fingerpaint Marketing. "Fingerpaint has a talented management team and tremendous potential. I look forward to putting my background and skills to work to help the company continue to deliver best-in-class revenue growth."
To learn more about Fingerpaint, its trailblazing work and inclusive company culture, please visit www.FingerpaintMarketing.com .
About Fingerpaint
Reset your expectations of a marketing agency. Independent by design, with integrated talent across Saratoga Springs, New York; Conshohocken, Pennsylvania; Scottsdale, Arizona; and Columbus, Ohio, Fingerpaint is committed to creating and executing meaningful brand experiences that are never paint by number.
In the last 2 years, Fingerpaint received 14 American Advertising Awards (formerly the ADDYs); was named 2014 Agency of the Year and a 2017 finalist by Med Ad News; was named Advertising Agency of the Year by PM360 in 2015; has been named to Inc. Magazine's list of the 5000 Fastest-Growing Companies for the past 5 years; was selected a Best Place to Work by the Albany and Philadelphia Business Journals; and won Business Intelligence Group's PR & Marketing Agency of the Year in 2017. Founder Ed Mitzen was honored as 2016's Industry Person of the Year by Med Ad News. Visit us at fingerpaintmarketing.com and follow us on Facebook , Twitter , LinkedIn and Instagram .
